Trigger.name: prompt
Trigger.script:
cecho(" <red>[<white>" .. snd.target .. "<red>]") snd.illusion_found = false if snd.offense_loaded then local msg snd.battle_aff = "none" snd.chasten_aff = "none" snd.last_cured = "" snd.rebounded = false if snd.toggles.alerts then snd.run_alerts() end if #snd.alertness >= 1 and snd.toggles.affcalling then dir = snd.parseDir(snd.alertnessDir) msg = "wt [" .. string.upper(snd.alertType) .. "] -" .. string.upper(dir) .. "- " for i in pairs(snd.alertness) do msg = msg .. snd.alertness[i] .. " " end snd.send(msg) end snd.alertness = {} snd.alertnessDir = "none" end
snd.defended = false
disableTrigger("Sunder Dodge") disableTrigger("Sunder Parry") disableTrigger("Sunder Rebounding")
snd.core()
if snd.delete_prompt then deleteLine() snd.delete_prompt = false end
if snd.bashing_loaded or snd.toggles.fastwalk then
if snd.new.area then if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "the Shattered Vortex" then x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") level = tonumber(x) if level < 100 then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Low Level)" elseif snd.faction == "spirit" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Spirit)" elseif snd.faction == "shadow" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Shadow)" end if area ~= snd.my.area then cecho("\n<green>Entering: " .. area) snd.load_targets(area) send(" ") end else cecho("\n<green>Entering: " .. gmcp.Room.Info.area) snd.load_targets(gmcp.Room.Info.area) send(" ") end snd.new.area = false end
if snd.new.room and (snd.toggles.fasthunt or snd.toggles.fastwalk) then snd.ylem_check = false if bot.going and (snd.pathing or (mmp.speedWalkCounter and mmp.speedWalkCounter or speedWalkCounter) ~= 0) then return end
if snd.toggles.fasthunt and snd.are_we_with_grouped() then snd.toggles.bashing = true snd.waiting.balance = false snd.room_clear = true snd.runBasher() snd.core() elseif bot.going then expandAlias("move") end end end if snd.class == "Monk" then snd.stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.stance end snd.new.room = false

Trigger.name: def start

regexCodeList.string: A serpentine blademistress spits onto her scimitar before slicing into you, and your arm wastes away beneath burning venom.
Blood floats up through the water as a blackened, ravenous shark seizes your arm in its maw, nearly tearing it from your body and snapping bones in the process.
The crone strokes your arm, withering it into uselessness.
^Before you can avoid it, (\w+)('s|') hand brushes against your arm and it withers away\.$

regexCodeList.string: A tattered Bahkatu experiment tears into your knee with his rabid maw, snapping the bone easily beneath such immense pressure.
A giant, rabid Syll seizes your leg in an iron grip, nearly pulling it clean from the socket.
A chimera's black lion head seizes your leg in its grip, wrenching it painfully from its socket as it tosses you to the ground.
A sharp-toothed gremlin's eyes gleam as it slams its head into your knee, shattering it and knocking you off-balance.
^(\w+) reaches out and grabs your leg, which almost gives way underneath you as it shrivels feebly away\.$

regexCodeList.string: You use Subjugation Endoskeleton.

A swarm of bone fragments bursts in a calamitous display, shards of bone splintering to plunge deeply into your flesh. Your skin bulges and contorts as the fragments of your swarm eat ruthlessly away at every piece of bone in your body, replacing them with newer, stronger pieces of your own formation. As the pain subsides and you rise anew, naught remains of your fragments.

Trigger.name: general deaths
Trigger.script:
local reset_check = false local triggertext = matches[1]
if triggertext:find("Underking") then local dead_rooms_check = {"109", "108", "110", "9278", "18524"} if table.contains(dead_rooms_check, tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num)) then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end elseif triggertext:find("Void") then local dead_rooms_check = {"62630", "18523", "66313", "66312", "64992"} if table.contains(dead_rooms_check, tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num)) then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end elseif triggertext:find("desolate mire") then if gmcp.Room.Info.num == 60044 then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end end
if triggertext:find("Substitute") then for a in pairs(snd.afflictions) do snd.aff_remove(a) end end -- -- if triggertext:find("Starburst") then -- reset_check = true -- end
if triggertext:find("Mirror") and gmcp.Room.Info.num == 1330 then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") elseif triggertext:find("Blackness") and gmcp.Room.Info.num == 31040 then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end
if reset_check then snd.reset_me()
snd.toggles.active = false
for i in pairs(snd.my_limb_damage) do snd.my_limb_damage[i] = 0 end
end

regexCodeList.string: The Hall of the Underking.
Before the Soul Mirror.
Traversing the Void
Blackness.
A strange and desolate mire.

Trigger.name: Starburst
Trigger.script:
for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do snd.defenses[i].needit = false end
snd.reset_me()
snd.toggles.bashing = false snd.toggles.attacking = false snd.toggles.fasthunt = false
raiseEvent("sunder_update_toggles")
for i=1, 10 do cecho("\n<gold>You starbursted!") end
for i in pairs(snd.my_limb_damage) do snd.my_limb_damage[i] = 0 end

regexCodeList.string: You use Tattoos Starburst.
return snd.illusionChecks.abilityGate()
Your starburst tattoo flares as the world is momentarily tinted red.

regexCodeList.string: ^You take a long drag off your pipe filled with (\w+)\.$

Trigger.script: snd.emptypipes[snd.smokedpipe] = true

Trigger.name: smoked end

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Pipes emptied by lumi/ec

^\w+ uses Illumination Flare on you\.$

Trigger.name: filled pipe
Trigger.script: local herbMap = { ["a reishi mushroom"] = "reishi", ["some willow bark"] = "willow", ["a yarrow root"] = "yarrow", } local herb = herbMap[matches[2]] snd.emptypipes[herb] = false

regexCodeList.string: ^You fill your pipe with (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: no pipe
Trigger.script: if snd.emptypipes[matches[2]] then snd.emptypipes[matches[2]] = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^I don't see what you are trying to put \'(\w+)\' into\.$

Trigger.name: died
Trigger.script: for i in pairs(snd.afflictions) do snd.aff_remove(i) end

Trigger.name: exp trigger
Trigger.script:
snd.stats.max_xp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxxp)
snd.stats.last_xp = string.gsub(matches[2],",","") snd.stats.last_xp = tonumber(snd.stats.last_xp)
snd.stats.xp = string.gsub(matches[4],",","") snd.stats.xp = tonumber(snd.stats.xp)
if snd.toggles.gags then local mobs_to_level = (snd.stats.max_xp - snd.stats.xp) / snd.stats.last_xp local mobs_xp_percent = (tonumber(snd.stats.last_xp) / snd.stats.max_xp) * 100 local xp_point_percent = (25 - (((snd.stats.xp / snd.stats.max_xp) * 100) % 25)) local mobs_to_point = xp_point_percent / mobs_xp_percent
deleteLine() snd.message("<red>Experience Gained<white>: " .. matches[2] .. " - from " .. matches[3] .. ". Total: " .. matches[4] .. ".") snd.message("<white>"..(snd.stats.max_xp - snd.stats.xp).."<yellow>xp [<white>"..round(mobs_to_level,0).."<yellow>] to level!")
local x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") local level = tonumber(x) if level > 99 then snd.message("<white>"..round(((xp_point_percent/100)*snd.stats.max_xp), 0).."<yellow>xp [<white>"..round(mobs_to_point,0).."<yellow>] to haven point!") end end

if snd.target == matches[6] and snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]] ~= nil then if matches[4] == "Shadowprice" then if snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]] ~= nil then snd.skill_being_used = matches[5] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]](matches[6], matches[4]) end elseif matches[4] == "Spiritpact" then if snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]] ~= nil then snd.skill_being_used = matches[5] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]](matches[6], matches[4]) end elseif snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]] ~= nil then snd.skill_being_used = matches[4] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](matches[6], matches[5]) end snd.getting_hit = matches[6] end
if matches[2] == snd.target and matches[6] == "You" then snd.used.rebounding = false end

if matches[2] == snd.target and matches[6] == "You" then snd.used.rebounding = false end

if matches[2] == snd.target and matches[6] == "You" then snd.used.rebounding = false end

Trigger.script: if snd.loban_no_more(matches[3]:lower()) == snd.target:lower() then snd.maybe_affs = {} for aff in string.gmatch(matches[4]:lower(), '([^,^.^: ]+)') do aff = snd.loban_no_more(aff) if aff ~= "whispering" and aff ~= "dictating" then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, aff) end end snd.hitting = matches[2] snd.who_called_affs = matches[2] end

Trigger.name: delivered venom
Trigger.script:
if snd.getting_hit ~= "You" then if snd.toggles.atkecho and snd.toggles.gags then deleteLine() snd.message("Gave: "..matches[2]) end
local attacks = {"Lob", "Assault", "Slaughter", "Carve", "Cripple"} if attacks[snd.skill_being_used] == nil then snd.used.rebounding = false end
snd.last_affs = {} local aff = snd.venomEffect(matches[2]) snd.target_got(aff) table.insert(snd.last_affs, aff) end

if matches[2] == snd.target then
for i in pairs(snd.globe_affs) do if snd.globecount ~= 0 then snd.target_got(snd.globe_affs[snd.globecount]) snd.globecount = snd.globecount-1 else break end end snd.target_cured("globes") end

Trigger.name: Runeband Triggering
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got(snd.runeband_affs[snd.runebandcount]) if snd.bandclockwise then snd.runebandcount = snd.runebandcount+1 if snd.runebandcount > 7 then snd.runebandcount = 1 end snd.message("Next runeband aff is: "..snd.runeband_affs[snd.runebandcount].."", "warning") else snd.runebandcount = snd.runebandcount-1 if snd.runebandcount < 1 then snd.runebandcount = 7 end snd.message("Next runeband aff is: "..snd.runeband_affs[snd.runebandcount].."", "warning") end end

Next aff is: "..snd.runeband_affs[snd.runebandcount].."", "warning") else snd.bandclockwise = false snd.message("Band is now counter-clockwise! Next aff is: "..snd.runeband_affs[snd.runebandcount].."", "warning") end end

^Bone and flesh shatters as \w+ wraps? .+ around (\w+)'s (.+)\.$

^\w+ lunges? .+ at (\w+)'s (.+) in a rapid stab, bones snapping beneath \w+ grip\.$
^Pulling back \w+ arm, \w+ bashe?s? (\w+)'s (.+) forcefully with .+\.$
^With a mighty swing of \w+ arm fitted with .+, \w+ smashe?s? into (\w+)'s (.+)\.$

^Slamming a fist into (\w+)'s (.+) with .+, you hear a sickening crunch\.$

Trigger.name: Crush part 1
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.last_limb_dmg = 2.5 snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.onHit2({"Dodge", "Parry"}) snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = snd.last_hit_limb end

Trigger.name: Crush part 2
Trigger.script:
if snd.getting_hit == snd.target then local amount = 2.5 --buckler/cavalry is 2.5 if matches[1]:find("tower") or matches[1]:find("kite") then amount = 12.5 elseif matches[1]:find("banded") then amount = 10 end snd.last_limb_dmg = amount snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.onHit2({"Dodge", "Parry"})
--We also need to add the difference to the first attack. Since you don't know what shield they're using until part 2, it's a little wonky. if amount > 2.5 and snd.luminary_crush_first_choice then -- already good if it's buckler snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.luminary_crush_first_choice, amount-2.5) -- add the amount minus what we've already given snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = nil end end disableTrigger("Crush Confirmation")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ swiftly follows? up by slamming .+ into \w+ .+\.$

Trigger.name: Monk Hit Tracking
Trigger.script:
-- Only adding limb damage if we see the hit connect message. if snd.target == snd.getting_hit then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2] if snd.hitting == "You" and snd.stance == "cobra" or snd.stance == "tiger" then snd.last_limb_dmg = snd.last_limb_dmg * 1.2 end snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg)
if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then local aff = snd.maybe_affs[1] if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) table.insert(snd.last_affs, aff) end end
end
disableTrigger("Monk Hit Tracking")

Trigger.name: Spores - Gain 1 stack from Imbue
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target and snd.checkAff("inoculated") then if snd.gravity <5 then snd.gravity = snd.gravity+1 snd.message("<red>"..snd.target.."<white> has <red>"..snd.gravity.." <white>stacks of spores.") end end

Trigger.name: Spores - lose 1 stack
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.gravity > 0 then snd.gravity = snd.gravity-1 else snd.gravity = 0 end snd.message("<red>"..snd.target.."<white> has <red>"..snd.gravity.." <white>stacks of spores.") end

regexCodeList.string: ^A patch of fungus breaks off from (.*) as an invasive culture dies out\.$

Trigger.name: Sporulation Sporey Spores
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.gravity >= 0 and snd.gravity <= 5 then snd.gravity = snd.gravity + 1 end snd.message("<red>" .. snd.target .. "<white> has <red>" .. snd.gravity .. " <white>stacks of spores.") elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: Sciomancy Repay / Maldeiction Obeisance
Trigger.script:
snd.repay = snd.repay + 1 snd.repay_timers = snd.repay_timers or {} local index = #snd.repay_timers + 1 local time = 10 if snd.have_aff("laxity") then time = time + 2 end local command = function() if snd.repay > 0 then snd.repay = snd.repay - 1 end snd.repay_timers[index] = nil snd.core() end
snd.repay_timers[index] = {timer = tempTimer(time, command), command = command}

regexCodeList.string: You use Sciomancy Repay.
You use Malediction Obeisance.

Trigger.name: Syncopate tracking for repay
Trigger.script: local syncopateTime = 3 for _, aff in pairs(snd.mental_affs) do if snd.have_aff(aff) then syncopateTime = syncopateTime+1 end end syncopateTime = syncopateTime + snd.hidden_afflictions if snd.repay_timers then for index, timerInfo in pairs(snd.repay_timers) do local timeRemaining = remainingTime(timerInfo.timer) killTimer(timerInfo.timer) timerInfo.timer = tempTimer(timeRemaining+syncopateTime, timerInfo.command) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses Numerology Syncopate on you\.$
return snd.illusionChecks.abilityGate()

if matches[2] == snd.target then local limb_table = {"right leg", "left leg", "left arm", "right arm",} for k, v in pairs(limb_table) do if matches[1]:find(v) then snd.last_hit_limb = v end end
snd.last_limb_dmg = 30
snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg ) end

snd.target_got(aff)
end disableTrigger("Fury Shatter Second Aff")

Trigger.name: poultice
Trigger.script:
if matches[2]:lower() == snd.target:lower() then snd.target_cured("slickness") snd.target_cured("slough") if snd.sloughTimer then killTimer(snd.sloughTimer) end if not snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then if matches[4] == "epidermal" then snd.target_last_used_salve = "epidermal" if matches[6] == "head" then if snd.checksomeAffs({"stuttering","blurry_vision","indifference","burnt_eyes","sight"}, 1) then snd.target_used("epidermal_head") else snd.target_got("sight") end elseif matches[6] == "torso" then snd.target_used("epidermal_torso") elseif matches[6] == "skin" then snd.target_used("epidermal") end else snd.target_used(matches[4]) end end
if snd.class == "Zealot" and matches[2] == snd.target then cecho("\n"..snd.target.." Now has <light_goldenrod>"..snd.flamestack.."<dodger_blue> stacks of intensity") end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: Sunder Parry
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then if #snd.last_affs >= 1 then if snd.last_affs[1] == "blaze" or snd.last_affs[1] == "wasi" then snd.used.rebounding = true else for i in pairs(snd.last_affs) do snd.target_cured(snd.last_affs[i]) end end end
snd.templar_last_limb = snd.last_hit_limb
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.last_limb_dmg ~= 0 then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 end
if snd.using_both_hands == 1 then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, 1, snd.last_affs[1]) end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = nil
end
disableTrigger("Sunder Parry")

Trigger.name: Haymaker blow Hit Confirmation
Trigger.script: if (multimatches[1][3] == snd.target or multimatches[1][4] == snd.target) then if multimatches[1][2]:find("mercy") then snd.last_limb_dmg = 20 snd.target_got("lightwound") snd.target_got("deepwound") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "lightwound") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "deepwound") else snd.last_limb_dmg = 7.5 snd.target_got("lightwound") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "lightwound") end snd.last_hit_limb = "torso" snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) end

regexCodeList.string: (^Lurching forward with violent momentum, \w+ slams? \w+ fist into (\w+)'s gut without mercy\.$|^Your fist collides with (\w+) but carries little momentum, barely a fraction of your true strength\.$)
(^The sheer force of .+ haymaker strikes at (\w+)'s organs, causing a massive internal bleed\.$|^Lacking sufficient force, your blow causes only minor wounding\.$)

Trigger.name: Rampage affs

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) winces as the contusion plaguing \w+ (.+) throbs from duress\.

^\w+'?s? blow connects with brutal force\.$

^\w+'?s? blow connects with brutal force\.$

Trigger.name: Swagger / Contempt
Trigger.script: if not snd.swaggered then snd.swaggered = true tempTimer(5,[[snd.swaggered = false]]) end

regexCodeList.string: You possess mighty swagger in your actions.
Contempt and spite drive your body onwards.

Trigger.name: Swagger Counter
Trigger.script:
if snd.swagger == 0 then snd.swagger = 1 elseif snd.swagger == 1 then snd.swagger = 2 elseif snd.swagger == 2 then snd.swagger = 3 end snd.swaggered = true tempTimer(5,[[snd.swaggered = false]])
cecho("<red>\nSwagger Total: <white>"..snd.swagger)

regexCodeList.string: You let your muscles droop for a moment, then force them taut with all your strength.

Trigger.name: Too Swag
Trigger.script: snd.swagger = 3

regexCodeList.string: Your strength is too sapped to use your fists effectively.
Your strength is far too sapped!
^Your strength is too sapped to use your fists effectively.$

Trigger.name: Strength Returns
Trigger.script: if snd.swagger == 3 then snd.swagger = 2 elseif snd.swagger == 2 then snd.swagger = 1 elseif snd.swagger == 1 then snd.swagger = 0 end

regexCodeList.string: You feel your muscles bulge as your strength returns.

Trigger.name: broke
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then if matches[2] == snd.target and matches[3]~= "head" and matches[3] ~= "torso" then snd.target_got(matches[3].." broken") snd.target_got(matches[3].." crippled") end snd.message("<red>"..matches[2].."'s <white>"..matches[3].." was broken!")
snd.limb_status[matches[3]] = "broken" elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s? (.+) breaks from all the damage\.$
^(\w+)'s? (.+) is shredded into meaty ribbons\.$
^(\w+) grows sluggish, .+ (head) marred with trauma\.$
^(\w+) shudders from the discomfort suffered to .+ (torso)\.$

Trigger.name: mangled
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.message("<red>"..matches[2].."'s <white>"..matches[3].." was mangled!") if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[3] snd.last_limb_dmg = 66.66-snd.limb_dmg[matches[3]] if snd.checkAff("armor_tattoo") then snd.last_limb_dmg = snd.last_limb_dmg*2 --make sure this doesn't do wonky end snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.limb_status[matches[3]] = "mangled" end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s? (.+) has been (?:beaten|torn) into uselessness\.$
^(\w+) groans loudly, clutching .+ mangled and bloodied (head)\.$

Trigger.name: mending
Trigger.script: if matches[2]:lower() == snd.target:lower() then snd.mendingApply(matches[4]) elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end if snd.class == "Zealot" and matches[2] == snd.target then cecho("\n"..snd.target.." Now has <light_goldenrod>"..snd.flamestack.."<dodger_blue> stacks of intensity") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a mending poultice against (the )?\w+ (head|torso|right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|skin|legs|arms), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

Trigger.name: restoration
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_last_used_salve = "restoration" snd.resto_limb = matches[4] snd.enemy_used_regenerate = false if restoration_timer then killTimer(restoration_timer) end snd.track_restoration(matches[2]) snd.current_restoration_aff = "" local aff_restoration_timer = true local restoTime = 4.05 if snd.checkAff("rot_body") then restoTime = restoTime + 4.3 end if snd.resto_limb == "torso" then if snd.checkAff("collapsed_lung") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "collapsed_lung" elseif snd.checkAff("spinal_rip") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "spinal_rip" elseif snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "burnt_skin" elseif snd.checkAff("crushed_chest") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.target_cured("crushed_chest") elseif snd.checkAff("heatspear") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "heatspear" elseif snd.checkAff("deepwound") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "deepwound" else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(restoTime, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end elseif snd.resto_limb == "head" then if snd.checkAff("mauled_face") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "mauled_face" elseif snd.checkAff("smashed_throat") and snd.limb_status["head"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "smashed_throat" elseif snd.checkAff("voidgaze") and snd.limb_status["head"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "voidgaze" else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(restoTime, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end --All limbs don't have special resto affs, so just remove the damage accrued. else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(restoTime, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end
if aff_restoration_timer then restoration_timer = tempTimer(restoTime,[[snd.target_cured(snd.current_restoration_aff)]]) end
end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a restoration poultice against (the )?\w+ (head|torso|right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

^A .* golem reaches out and seizes (\w+)'s ([a-z ]+) in its powerful grip, pulling and twisting until the bone snaps\.$
^\w+ reaches out to grab (\w+)'s ([a-z ]+), and it shrivels away\.$
^You hear the sharp snap of bone as .* rends (\w+)'s ([a-z ]+)\.$

Trigger.name: bruising
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == snd.target then local bruise = matches[2] local limb = matches[4]
if bruise == "light" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 1 elseif bruise == "moderate" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 2 elseif bruise == "critical" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 3 end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your strikes cause (\w+) bruising on (\w+)'s (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Regenerate
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.enemy_used_regenerate = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) becomes flushed as .+ heals with quickened haste.$

Trigger.name: Angel sear proc
Trigger.script: if snd.target == matches[2] then if snd.last_affs[1]:find("bruising") then local limb = snd.last_affs[1]:gsub("bruising ", "") snd.limb_bruising[limb] = snd.limb_bruising[limb]+1 elseif snd.target_last_used_salve ~= "restoration" then snd.target_got(snd.last_affs[1]) elseif snd.target_last_used_salve == "restoration" then if aff_restoration_timer then killTimer(aff_restoration_timer) end if restoration_timer then killTimer(restoration_timer) end end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A burst of colorful steam rises from (\w+)'s skin with sudden surprise\.$

Trigger.name: Soothing
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_last_used_salve = "soothing" if snd.toggles.atkecho and snd.toggles.gags then deleteLine() snd.message(matches[2] .. ": soothing " .. matches[3]) end if snd.checkAff("whiplash") and matches[4] == "head" then snd.target_cured("whiplash") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "whiplash") elseif snd.checkAff("backstrain") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("backstrain") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "backstrain") elseif snd.checkAff("muscle_spasms") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("muscle_spasms") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "muscle_spasms") elseif snd.checkAff("stiffness") then snd.target_cured("stiffness") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "stiffness") elseif snd.checkAff("sore_wrist") and matches[4]:find("arm") then snd.target_cured("sore_wrist") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore_wrist") elseif snd.checkAff("weak_grip") then snd.target_cured("weak_grip") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "weak_grip") elseif snd.checkAff("sore_ankle") and matches[4]:find("leg") then snd.target_cured("sore_ankle") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore_ankle") end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a soothing poultice against (the )?\w+ (.+), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if not snd.checkAff("heartflutter") then snd.target_got("heartflutter") end end

Trigger.name: Tidesage daubs
Trigger.script: local daubMap = {tentacle = "red", wave = "blue", mouth = "yellow", cephalopod = "green", fin = "purple", eye = "gold"} snd.runemarkMinor = daubMap[matches.minor] snd.runemarkMajor = daubMap[matches.major]

if string ~= "" then snd.send(string) end snd.scented = {} end

Trigger.name: got hit
Trigger.script:
local exclusions = {"Relic", "Raloth", "Artifact", "Survival", "Research", "Manipulation", "Tattoos"} local skill = multimatches[2][3]
if not table.contains(exclusions, skill) then found_set = "none" for set in pairs(snd.cureset_skills) do if table.contains(snd.cureset_skills[set], skill) then found_set = set end end
if snd.class_hitting == "none" then --haven't seen anyone hit yet if found_set == "none" then --skill isn't in class list send("cureset switch general", false) --non-specific cureset elseif snd.cureset ~= found_set then snd.cureset = found_set -- because you may not have the cureset, go ahead and set it for usage send("cureset switch " .. found_set, false) --swap to class cureset snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting end elseif snd.class_hitting ~= found_set then --this is a second class hitting snd.class_hitting = found_set send("cureset switch group", false) end snd.person_hitting = multimatches[2][2]
if not table.contains(snd.people_hitting_me, multimatches[2][2]) then table.insert(snd.people_hitting_me, multimatches[2][2]) tempTimer(4, [[table.remove(snd.people_hitting_me, 1)]]) end end

Trigger.name: vermin
Trigger.script: if snd.toggles.vermin then if snd.toggles.newbie then send("k vermin") else --single attack logic snd.bashing.target = "vermin" battack = "" for k,v in pairs(snd.class_list) do if snd.class_list[k].class == snd.class then if snd[v.class:lower().."_bash_override"] then snd[v.class:lower().."_bash_override"]() else v.func() end snd.send("qeb stand"..snd.sep..battack) end end end end snd.vermin = snd.vermin + 1 if snd.vermin >= 3 then if snd.toggles.vermin == true then if bot.going then tempTimer(1.5, [[expandAlias("move")]]) end disableTimer("moveroom") end end

regexCodeList.string: Tongue flicking to taste the air, a pebbly black snake comes into view.
The glint of pebbly scales alerts you to the entrance of a black snake.
With a faint slithering noise, a pebbly black snake enters.
You spy a seagull, rooting around the ground for scraps of anything edible.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a carrion beetle.
A carrion beetle enters, scavenging for flesh.
A carrion beetle scuttles in, searching for food.
A black rat scurries in, looking for food.
A reticulated planthopper lands on a perch nearby, becoming eerily still.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a giant ugly pincher.
An ugly pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
A tiny pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of an ugly pincher.
A giant ugly pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
An ugly pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
A tiny pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a tiny pincher.
A giant ugly pincher scuttles in, searching for food.

Trigger.name: Sell Vermin
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.vermin == true then local area = gmcp.Room.Info.area if area == "Spinesreach" then snd.send("sell vermin to ghada") elseif area == "Duiran" then snd.send("sell vermin to nysos") elseif area == "Bloodloch" then snd.send("sell vermin to enzo") elseif area == "the City of Enorian" then snd.send("sell vermin to shrift") end
snd.toggles.vermin = false snd.send("vermin") disableTimer("moveroom") end

Trigger.name: death prompt
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("Death In Room", 0)
if snd.toggles.calling and not snd.targeting.burst then if table.contains(snd.players_here, snd.targeting.who) then table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, snd.targeting.who)) end if snd.targeting.who == snd.target then snd.get_new_target() end end
snd.targeting.who = nil snd.targeting.burst = false

Trigger.name: Target no longer available
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.bashing then snd.no_target() end snd.target_gone = true
if not snd.toggles.calling then return end
local who = matches[2]:title()
if table.contains(snd.players_here, who) then table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, who)) send("ql") end
if who:lower() ~= "eld" and who == snd.target:title() then snd.no_target() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You can find no such target as '(\w+)'\.$

Trigger.name: Target list
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local list = matches[3]
if table.contains(snd.callers, matches[2]) then snd.addTargetList(list) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target list\: (.+)\."$

Trigger.name: Target Priority
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local tar = matches[3] local pos = matches[4] or nil
if table.contains(snd.callers, matches[2]) then snd.addSingleTarget(tar, pos) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+) (\d+)\."$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+)\."$

Trigger.name: dome/prismatic on target
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then local who = matches[2]:title() local count = 1 if not snd.illusion_found then if table.contains(snd.targeting.list, who) then local pos = table.index_of(snd.targeting.list, who) or nil for k, v in ipairs(snd.targeting.list) do if table.contains(snd.players_here, who) and table.contains(snd.players_here, v) and k > table.index_of(snd.targeting.list, who) then expandAlias("t " .. v) break end end else table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, who)) snd.get_new_target() end end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your attack is repelled by the dome of ylem protecting (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Remove Target
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local who = matches[3]
if table.contains(snd.callers, matches[2]) then snd.removeTarget(who) end

Trigger.name: fishing prompt
Trigger.script:
if auto_fish and fish_update then
fish_update = false
local linestrength = matches[2] local fishstrength = matches[3] local distance = matches[4]
if tonumber(linestrength) >= 95 and tonumber(distance) >= 10 then send("qeb fishing cut", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) >= 90 and tonumber(distance) >= 30 then send("qeb fishing cut", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) >= 7 and tonumber(fishstrength) >= 0 then send("qeb fishing reel", false) elseif tonumber(fishstrength) >= 25 then send("qeb fishing lead", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) <= 100 then send("qeb fishing reel", false)
end
end
deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^Line: (\d+)\% Fish: (\d+)\% Distance: (\d+)\%$

Trigger.name: fishing caught
Trigger.script:
deleteFull() Fishingcast = false snd.fishinginfo.currentfish = tonumber(snd.fishinginfo.currentfish + 1) snd.fishmsg("<SeaGreen>You caught <green>"..matches[2].."<SeaGreen>!") snd.fishmsg("<SeaGreen>You now have <green>"..snd.fishinginfo.currentfish.." <SeaGreen>fish out of <yellow>"..snd.fishinginfo.bucket_capacity.."<SeaGreen> in your bucket!\n") Fishingcaught = false Fishtick = 0
if auto_fish and snd.fishinginfo.currentfish >= snd.fishinginfo.bucket_capacity then auto_fish = false Reeling = "cut" Fishtick = 0 snd.fishmsg("<red>Autofishing disabled.") snd.fishmsg("<SeaGreen>Your fishing bucket is full! Remember to return to Hob<green>(v53402)<SeaGreen> and <red>GIVE FISHBUCKET TO HOB<SeaGreen> to receive payment and factions points!") snd.fishmsg("<red>CUTTING LINE!") elseif auto_fish and snd.fishinginfo.currentfish < snd.fishinginfo.bucket_capacity then Reeling = "recast" end
Fishingfunction()
save_fishinginfo_db()

regexCodeList.string: ^With a mighty heave, you lift (.*) out of the water\.$

Trigger.name: CaptureFishingHole
Trigger.script:
-- Make sure tables actually exist. if not fishing_holes then load_fishing_db() end
fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] or {}
-- Get some basic data. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].name = multimatches[1][2] fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].type = multimatches[2][2]
-- Track the room. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms or {} local found_room = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms) do if v == gmcp.Room.Info.num then found_room = true break end end if not found_room then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms, gmcp.Room.Info.num) end
-- Format the fishing hole contents string so that it can be parsed. multimatches[2][3] = "|" .. multimatches[2][3]:gsub(", ", "||") .. "|" multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub(" and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|%|%|", "||")
-- Iterate over the fishing hole contents and get the fish in the hole. local temp_fish = {} for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|%d+ of ([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do local skip = false for tmp in ftype:gmatch("%d of ") do skip = true break end if not skip then table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end end
-- Make sure our fishing table exists before checking it in the following loop. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish or {} for k, v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if v == "unfamiliar creatures" then table.remove(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, k) break end end
for _, ftype in pairs(temp_fish) do local found = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if ftype == v then found = true break end end if not found then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, ftype) end end
-- Save data. save_fishing_db()

Alias.name: Main index
Alias.script:
cecho("
<CadetBlue>Sunder Helpfile") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Welcome to <green>Sunder<ForestGreen>! This helpfile is meant to give you an introduction to different things that <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>can do. It will not cover every option entirely, but it will provide the most often used or asked about items a bit more light to show how or when to use them.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The first thing you should know is the <DeepSkyBlue>stap <ForestGreen>command. You type <DeepSkyBlue>stap <ForestGreen>and <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>will cease whatever it is currently attempting to do, for the most part. Some items may need to be toggled manually depending on the situation, but by and large <DeepSkyBlue>stap <ForestGreen>will keep you from hitting someone or something, or any other number of items.") cecho("
") cecho("
<MediumTurquoise>The index for the rest of the helpfiles is as such:") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Bashing <ForestGreen>Do you want to go bashing? <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> has you covered!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>PK <ForestGreen>Playerkilling and you. Please practice safe PvP.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Defenses <ForestGreen>How to upkeep, turn on/off and customize defenses.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Ylem <ForestGreen>Finding minors and other ylem based information.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Utilities <ForestGreen>Vermin, fishing, shops, questing and more.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>War <ForestGreen>Helpful aliases for handling war divisions") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Each above entry will point you toward more specific items in each section as needed.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Use <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help <subject> <ForestGreen>to navigate through everything else.") cecho("
") raiseEvent("sunder_update_vitals")

Alias.name: Ylem helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>YLEM <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Hunting after those elusive minors and lessers has never been easier! This will walk you through how to do that with a few easy steps. To start, you will need to make sure you have learned <DeepSkyBlue>LEYLINES <ForestGreen>in <MediumTurquoise>Vision <ForestGreen>(289 lessons) and <DeepSkyBlue>SHACKLING <ForestGreen>in <MediumTurquoise>Refining <ForestGreen>(239 lessons). While <DeepSkyBlue>shackling <ForestGreen>is not necessarily needed for this to work, it will benefit you in the long run and keep you from having to deal with multiple eld at once. In the process of learning <DeepSkyBlue>leylines<ForestGreen>, you will also learn <DeepSkyBlue>DETECTION<ForestGreen>, which will assist you in finding focal points. This is only needed if you do not have any reserves to use <MediumTurquoise>MANIPULATE PYLON FOR NODESENSE<ForestGreen>, which allows you to PATH TRACK MINOR directly to the focal point. For this, you will also need to purchase ylem goggles from the vendor at your pylon. Just PATH TRACK PYLON and ASK <vendor> WARES to BUY GOGGLES FROM <vendor>.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>ylem finder is simple to use! To start, just type in <DeepSkyBlue>goylem start <ForestGreen>and watch as it does all the work of walking around for you. It has a set path that it follows and is easy to change if you wish to do so or if new areas are added before <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>is updated again. It will continually run until it finds either a minor or a lesser. If it finds a minor, you can either DETECTION ON and walk around to find the focal point (it is highlighted in <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> already, so you won't miss it!) or you can PATH TRACK MINOR if you have ylem goggles and have used MANIPULATE PYLON FOR NODESENSE. The nodesense defense will only last for one hour or ten uses. Once you find the minor and extract it (EXTRACTION is the syntax) fully, you can <DeepSkyBlue>goylem next <ForestGreen>to have <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>continue the set path. If you need to stop at any point, you can <DeepSkyBlue>goylem stop <ForestGreen>and it will take you back to your city and reset the variables to start over if you decide to pick it up again. If you need to stop temporarily, you can just <DeepSkyBlue>stap<ForestGreen> and then <DeepSkyBlue>goylem <ForestGreen>to start back up again where you left off!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem start <ForestGreen>Start finding foci") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem next <ForestGreen>Move to the next area") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem stop <ForestGreen>Stop and return to your city") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem <ForestGreen>Continue if you had to stop") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sh <ForestGreen>Shackle an eld in the room to stop it from hitting you!") cecho("
")

Alias.name: Sunder bashing
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>bashing<CadetBlue> help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has several methods of helping you bash, from hitting things in your room to helping you navigate the landscape of Aetolia and its many areas. You can easily know if <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> recognizes your area by doing a check with the <red>SURVEY<ForestGreen> command. As long as you see mob names, <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> will be able to hit things for you.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Consider this your warning: <ForestGreen>The folks who upkeep Sunder do not, by any means, condone or suggest using Sunder to do things while you are AFK or otherwise unable to attend to your character. From HELP AUTOMATION -> FULLY automating quests and hunting - with movement and all actions included in the triggers - are allowed so long as one is present at the computer, as well as gambling automation. Please do not abuse what is being given to you without regard for the admin stance.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>aa <ForestGreen>Make <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>try to hit everything in the room!") cecho("
 <ForestGreen> If there is nothing left in the room, this will turn off.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>ff <ForestGreen>Want to walk around manually and have Sunder hit things? Use this.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen> It automatically turns on hitting when it finds a valid target.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>grp <person> <ForestGreen>Inform <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> of your bashing party.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>grp queen rook pawn <ForestGreen>Example of adding more than one person.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>orbs <ForestGreen>Activate your ylem orbs with one alias!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sunder toggle generic <ForestGreen>Use generic mob type instead of number to bash.") cecho("
") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> has some more advanced features listed in <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help autobashing<ForestGreen>.")
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Sunder auto bashing
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>autobashing<CadetBlue> help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>recognizes a good majority of the areas in the game, including the main bashing areas and most of the ones you might use while gaining levels. The following methods will help you bash these areas, either singular or multiple at a time.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Consider this your warning: <ForestGreen>The folks who upkeep Sunder do not, by any means, condone or suggest using Sunder to do things while you are AFK or otherwise unable to attend to your character. From <red>HELP AUTOMATION -><ForestGreen> 'FULLY automating quests and hunting - with movement and all actions included in the triggers - are allowed so long as one is present at the computer, as well as gambling automation.' <red>Please do not abuse what is being given to you without regard for the admin stance.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goarea <ForestGreen>Bash the current area you're in and then walk back to your city.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>Use this for bashing just one area. No need to use the below command.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>bashpath <areas> <ForestGreen>Define your custom bashing route from valid areas.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>It will automatically walk you from the last room of area 1 to area 2, etc.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>bashpath tiyen, xaanhal, mamashi <ForestGreen>- for example, would bash those areas and then head home.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>There are some more functions in the scripts for use in your code for creating paths, doing new areas, etc.") --You would want to look into SND Autopaths->Creating->start/add/compile.
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Questing Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>QUESTING <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Always ending up with odds and ends in your inventory or kestrels following you around EVERYWHERE because you dared to walk through Three Widows? Well no more! You will now be able to toggle quests on and off so that you only whistle or pick up items when you want!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>As of right now, there is only one toggle to turn it on/off. More may be added in the future! It will not auto-walk areas for you, you will still need to walk around and while you do so <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> will pick up items and turn them in as appropriate. ") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggle questing <ForestGreen>Toggles questing on/off") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Who Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>WHO <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Tired of looking through the who list trying to figure out who is where and who they are with when looking for that pesky lesser that was just tapped? Well, thanks to <green>Czcibor<ForestGreen>, <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has built in group checking via the who list!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Using the alias <DeepSkyBlue>WHO GROUPS <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>will now sift through the who list and capture room locations. Once it is done with that, it will show you the names of the rooms that have more than one person in that location, how many people are there, and then who all is in that location! Note that those with the <red>cloaking<ForestGreen> artifact or in hidden rooms are unable to be tracked in this manner.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>who groups <ForestGreen>Shows the full WHO list and then the grouped rooms with more than one person") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Vermin Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>VERMIN <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>We get it! Every time you see that daily/weekly/monthly(especially the monthly) milestone for vermin, you just want to run head first into a team of mages collapsing singularities and calamaties! So hopefully these will make your life easier from here on out and save you from death by mages! No guarantees :(") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>First, you will want to make sure you are wielding whatever you need to kill the vermin. After you are ready to start your quest of ridding a city of its vermin, you just <DeepSkyBlue>PATH TRACK <ForestGreen>to any city <LimeGreen>(make sure you are not an enemy!) <ForestGreen>and then type <DeepSkyBlue>toggle vermin <ForestGreen>to start! This will work similar to <DeepSkyBlue>gogo <ForestGreen>in that it will just begin bashing from where you are currently. No matter which city you begin your vermin bashing in, it will end at the vermin mob and will automatically sell your vermin! So no more accidental offerings of vermin to your gods! Should you need to finish early, just type <DeepSkyBlue>toggle vermin <ForestGreen>again and an echo will pop up to remind you to go sell your vermin!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggle vermin <ForestGreen>Toggles the vermin autobasher on/off") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-----------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Fluidcache Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>FLUIDCACHE <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Ever log in and notice you lost a bunch of refills because your vials, bandages, or (gods forbid) rags decayed? Well NO MORE! Or at least, LESS LIKELY! <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>is now equipped with a few more aliases to help alleviate this problem!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Simply input the alias you want to use and then either let <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>fill your empty vials, bandages, or rags or consume them into your fluidcache. If you are new to Aetolia, make sure you read <green>HELP FLUIDCACHE <ForestGreen>if you have not already!") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Keep in mind that these aliases will not buy anything for you. Please refer to <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help shops <ForestGreen>to see the aliases that will purchase bulk items for you!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>venoms <ForestGreen>First buy the rags you need for combat and type <DeepSkyBlue>venoms") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>to have <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>fill your rags for you. You can search this") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>alias in your scripts to change which venoms you want it to fill!") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>unvenom <ForestGreen>Just what it says! Typing <DeepSkyBlue>unvenom <ForestGreen>will fluidcache consume") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>all the venoms from your rags!") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fillvials <ForestGreen>This alias will fill the vials in your inventory from your fluidcache.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>unfillvials <ForestGreen>Like <DeepSkyBlue>unvenom<ForestGreen>, this alias will consume the elixirs") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>in your vials back into your fluidcache.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fillbandages <ForestGreen>This will fill the clean bandages in your inventory with the poultices") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>from your fluidcache.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>unfillbandages <ForestGreen>Again... same as the other 'un' aliases, but for poultices.") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Shop Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>SHOPS <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Purchasing necessary items from shops can be a bit mundane, but NO MORE! Often you will find yourself buying many refills or masses of pills - to help combat this, <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>includes a few aliases to help make that less painful!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The first thing you need to do is find a shop. You can do this by going to any city (including Esterport!) and using <DeepSkyBlue>PATH TRACK DIRECTORY<ForestGreen>. This will take you to the directory where you can peruse all the shops in that city (think of it like a search engine). From there you can <DeepSkyBlue>DIRECTORY <ForestGreen>'<DeepSkyBlue>item<ForestGreen>' to see which shop is carrying the item(s) you need. If you have MXP turned on, you can click on the vnum for the shop you want or <DeepSkyBlue>PATH TRACK vnum <ForestGreen>to get there.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Once you are in a shop, you will simply need to put in the alias for the items you wish to purchase and let <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>do the rest!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>buypills # <ForestGreen>Pills! Typing <DeepSkyBlue>buypills <ForestGreen>followed by an amount will buy that amount") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>of every type of pill! EXAMPLE: <DeepSkyBlue>buypills 500 <ForestGreen>will buy <LimeGreen>500 <ForestGreen>of each pill.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fillcache # type <ForestGreen>Fluidcache! Just use <DeepSkyBlue>fillcache <ForestGreen>followed by the number of times") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>you want to buy a refill and what type of refill you want to buy.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>The types are: <DeepSkyBlue>venoms<ForestGreen>, <DeepSkyBlue>poultices<ForestGreen>, and <DeepSkyBlue>elixirs<ForestGreen>. EXAMPLE: <DeepSkyBlue>fillcache") cecho("
 <DeepSkyBlue>10 elixirs <ForestGreen>will purchase <LimeGreen>10 <ForestGreen>refills of each type of elixir. The purchase") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>line may be gagged, so just check your FC before and after purchasing!") cecho("
 <LimeGreen>**NOTE** <ForestGreen>This will buy the amount of refills, so to fill your cache(<LimeGreen>1500<ForestGreen>)") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>you will only need to purchase <LimeGreen>30 <ForestGreen>refills!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Fishing Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>FISHING <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Our <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>fishing system has been put together from several different systems, and will help you with your fishing milestones or just when you want to kick back and relax to earn some gold. The first thing you will want to do is set the amount of max fish you want to catch using <DeepSkyBlue>sunder maxfish # <ForestGreen>and the amount of fish currently in your bucket using <DeepSkyBlue>sunder fishbucket #<ForestGreen>. Once this is done just turn on the autofisher and let <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>do the rest. You will notice that all the spam has been removed, but it is still working and will notify you when it turns off due to reaching the maxfish amount or if the fishing hole is empty.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Consider this your warning: <ForestGreen>The folks who upkeep Sunder do not, by any means, condone or suggest using Sunder to do things while you are AFK or otherwise unable to attend to your character. From HELP AUTOMATION -> FULLY automating quests and hunting - with movement and all actions included in the triggers - are allowed so long as one is present at the computer, as well as gambling automation. Please do not abuse what is being given to you without regard for the admin stance.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>1. Put up your wielded items manually and wield your pole.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>2. Go to a fishing hole.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>3. Do '<DeepSkyBlue>FISHING DISCERN<ForestGreen>' to make sure you see fish. This will
") cecho("<ForestGreen> track the hole type, vnum, and what fish you see automatically
") cecho("<ForestGreen> in a database it creates on the first time you use it.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>4. If you can fish there and there are fish, type in '<DeepSkyBlue>afish<ForestGreen>'
") cecho("<ForestGreen> to turn on the auto-fisher.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>5. If you run out of fish in this hole, it will turn off fishing on
") cecho("<ForestGreen> its own. You can also type in '<DeepSkyBlue>afish<ForestGreen>' to turn it off.
") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>afish <ForestGreen> Turns the auto-fisher off/on") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sunder maxfish <amount> <ForestGreen> Set and check the max amount of fish you want to catch.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sunder fishbucket <amount> <ForestGreen> Set and check the amount of fish in your bucket.
 Using <DeepSkyBlue>sunder fishbucket clear <ForestGreen>will set the amount to '<green>0<ForestGreen>'") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fishing search ?? <ForestGreen> You can search for a water hole type, or fish, from holes you've
 discerned.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fishing search full ?? <ForestGreen>If you prepend <DeepSkyBlue>info<ForestGreen> or <DeepSkyBlue>full<ForestGreen> it displays complete info instead of
 abridged.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fgo ?? <ForestGreen> Search and path to a specific fishing hole. EX: <DeepSkyBlue>fgo vortex<ForestGreen>.") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Name database help file
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>Name Database <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The name databse that <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> utilizes will be familiar to many of you who have come from other IRE games, including the utilization and coloring effects. See below for aliases to toggle certain items and general upkeep of the names contained.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Please note that you do NOT need to utilize the highlighting if you do not want to, but you absolutely do need the name database for other functions of <green>Sunder<ForestGreen>.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>By default, the name database should be installed when you set everything up. You can either make your own database of names as you go, or check on the discord and see if there's an updated list - you'll probably wind up with 1000+ names!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sndb settings <ForestGreen>Shows you current color configuration of everyone.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sndb hl <ForestGreen>Toggles the highlighting of names on/off.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sndb hl <org> <color> <ForestGreen>Change your custom color config per city.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>As a note -- Enemy highlighting isn't functional yet but is being worked on.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>qwp <ForestGreen>Parse the who list to add new names.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>whois <person> <ForestGreen>Shows basic info like level and class. Currently disabled.") cecho("
<tomato>Please don't use this to metagame. Self police.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>honors <person> <ForestGreen>Update one individual person. Not as useful due to API changes.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sndb clearout <ForestGreen>Remove unranked/people below level 50.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sndb redo <ForestGreen>Re-check everyone in the database.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>There are some more functions in the scripts for use in your code for checking city/class/if they exist in the database etc.")
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------")
--[[ sndb settings - Shows basic settings information sndb install - Initial install alias, otherwise unused
sndb hl - Highlight Names sndb hl (org) (colour) - Change highlighting of a particular city sndb hlprio (org|enemies) - Change highlight priority between cities/enemies sndb ehl (i|u|b) - Change format of enemy highlighting (italics/bold/underline) -- Enemy highlighting isn't functional yet but is being worked on.
qwp - Parse online people. As a failsafe, it won't print if there's unchecked people. Just use it again once it's checked them. whois (person) - Prints information pertaining to a person. honours (person) - Will honours as per usual, but also check them via API. sndb clearout - Remove unranked/low level people (under 50). sndb redo - Will re-honours everyone currently in the database.
sndNDB_getColour(person) - Useful for highlighting; will return the colour of the person's city. sndNDB_Exists(person) - Will tell you if they're tracked by the NDB yet.
sndNDB_getClass(person) sndNDB_getCitizenship(person) - Both self-explanatory. sndNDB_isCitizenOf(city, person) - Will return true if they're a citizen of X city.
]]

Alias.name: Sunder Utilities Index
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>UTILITIES <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has several different utilities that are quite useful! Below is a summarized list that will direct you to the correct files so that you can become familiar with them and reference back to them at any time!") cecho("
") cecho("
<MediumTurquoise>To view the following <green>Sunder <MediumTurquoise>help files, use <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help <MediumTurquoise><filename>!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Vermin <ForestGreen>Explantion on <green>Sunder's <ForestGreen>vermin autobasher!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Fishing <ForestGreen>Explantion on how to use <green>Sunder's <ForestGreen>fishing utilities!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Shops <ForestGreen>Quick aliases to make purchasing easier!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Fluidcache <ForestGreen>Aliases to consume and fill vials/rags/bandages!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Who <green>Sunder's <ForestGreen>WHO parsing system and how it works!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Questing <ForestGreen>Helpful questing aliases (no more pesky kestrels following you around!)") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Namedb <ForestGreen>All the commands for the databse.") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Sunder PK helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>PvP<CadetBlue> help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has several built in ways for every class to be, at some level, useful. Even if it is just automatically attacking a target with a bashing attack. <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>is not and will not be updated with the best 1v1 PvP methods, nor will requests for 1v1 specific items be given time. The intent of Sunder has been and always will be the ability for the average player to get into the PvP scene at the lowest level and be able to participate in team scenarios.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Some of the classes have decently fine-tuned aliases (Syssin, Templar) due to the original creator spending time in those classes. Remember that these were built on the effort of another player and they do not speak to your own skill or development. Using them to beat people at the low or middle tier of skill level does not indicate that you are improving. If you are interested in learning to PvP in the 1v1 arena, your best bet is to examine what is built here and expand or change it as opposed to relying on it without modification. These are public offenses and people can and will abuse their access to them to make it easy to beat you.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>ls <person> <ForestGreen>Choose your target caller(s)") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>ls stine vaessa bob <ForestGreen>Example of listening to more than one person.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>loc <ForestGreen>Need help?! Call out your place in the world over web!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>acl <ForestGreen>Toggle calling of afflictions over web.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>tcl <ForestGreen>Toggle calling of targets over web.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggles disperse <none/callers/all> <ForestGreen>Automatic dispersing of writhe affs.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>Default none. Not always necessary.") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> target calling - instead of the old rigid lists found within Sunder, we will now utilize the custom, on the fly lists along with our name database to be able to cycle through targets effectively in the room. Please see <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help calling<ForestGreen> for more information on using that.") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> has the following aliases available for you to use in combat. There may be more aliases included in the settings, but not always!")
if snd.class == "Monk" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Will use mind batter to hit with affs, if enemy prone then wrench.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>head <white> - Used for damage, does not deviate unless target is proned.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Limbs:") cecho("
 <green>ms<white> - Used to hit different limbs, will change combo depending on parry.") elseif snd.class == "Shapeshifter" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Goes for the head. Each time. Big damage/bleeding if not parried.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Limb:") cecho("
 <green>ms <white> - Straight limb breaks into jawlocks.") cecho("
 <green>insta<white> - Goes for quarter kills. Check AB QUARTER for more information.") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Utilizes slash to delay limb breaks, good for pushing level 2 breaks.") elseif snd.class == "Syssin" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>ms <white> - Basic dstab w/venoms. No hypnosis.") cecho("
 <green>magic<white> - More advanced, geared towards magic, uses hypnosis.") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - More advanced, geared towards physical, uses hypnosis.") cecho("
 <green>kl<white> - 1v1 offense. Does not snap for you as that requires timing.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Straight damage.") elseif snd.class == "Wayfarer" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>legs <white> - Uses lob to pressure leg breaks, will try to dropstrike if able.") cecho("
 <green>lock<white> - Experimental skirmish route to seal locks w/slaughter and muddled.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Sensitivity/sight to support transfix. Boosted halt to keep people in room.") cecho("
 <green>gaff<white> - Group affs w/preference toward venom lock. Slaughter if prone w/sensitivity.") cecho("
 <green>bleed<white> - Bleed focused to assist Templar w/hemorrhage.") elseif (snd.class == "Templar" or snd.class == "Revenant") then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>ret <white> - The 1v1 standard. Lock into retribution.") cecho("
 <green>newb<white> - Basic venoms, no bladefire empowerments, no vorpal.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Use a 2h weapon to zeal/dsw someone and do physical damage.") cecho("
 <green>bleed<white> - Bleed focused affs into hemorrhage.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Limb:") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Two small bludgeon weapons to deal bruising and limb damage.") elseif snd.class == "Shaman" or snd.class == "Alchemist" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>ms <white> - Straight vinelash w/venoms.") cecho("
 <green>storm<white> - Works toward stormtouched, then goes for lightning damage.") cecho("
 <green>supp<white> - Aff-lock support.") elseif snd.class == "Sentinel" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>salve<white> - Works towards frozen w/limb breaks. Need raloth/icewyrm.") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Venom lock into spinecut death sequence.") cecho("
 <green>group<white> - Group focused small aff pool into spinecut.") cecho("
 <green>ms<white> - Just venoms, no dhuriv attacks, perfect for starters.") elseif snd.class == "Luminary" or snd.class == "Earthcaller" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>git<white> - Damage kill with aff stacking and overwhelm.") cecho("
 <green>mana<white> - Straight mana sap.") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Smite + chasten.") cecho("
 <green>ms<white> - Sight into tfix/overwhelm.") elseif snd.class == "Ascendril" or snd.class == "Bloodborn" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>damage<white> - Damage kill.") cecho("
 <green>fire<white> - Set them ablaze and watch them burn.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>affs<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>solo<white> - Push limb damage/frozen for a shatter!") elseif snd.class == "Zealot" or snd.class == "Ravager" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Damage kill.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>fire<white> - Focus on ablaze for Zealot support I guess? idk") elseif snd.class == "Archivist" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build mental affs and go for unravel") elseif snd.class == "Carnifex" or snd.class == "Warden" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Overall limb route") cecho("
 <green>legs<white> - Specifically for legs!") elseif snd.class == "Indorani" or snd.class == "Oneiromancer" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs! High Aeon/Hourglass prio.") elseif snd.class == "Praenomen" or snd.class == "Akkari" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>mez<white> - Work on siphoning mana for annihilate and mesmerize!") elseif snd.class == "Teradrim" or snd.class == "Tidesage" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Overall limb route") elseif snd.class == "Sciomancer" or snd.class == "Runecarver" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Overall limb route via grip and erupt, adds in transfix/chill") cecho("
 <green>gdmg <white> - Damage kill with singularity/morass involved") cecho("
 <green>gaff<white> - Build affs with singularity/morass involved!") cecho("
 <green>sing1<white> - Make your singularity/morass") cecho("
 <green>gc<white> - Shoot your cannon/mortify at your target nearby") end
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
") cecho("
")

Alias.name: Sunder defenses helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>Defenses <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Upkeep of defenses can be a tedious task, especially those stripped after a certain amount of time or if you just don't want to worry about it. To that end, Sunder is equipped to be able to help you upkeep defenses in a mildly intelligent manner via checking what skills you have access. The system uses GMCP to automatically check your skills, as well as checking your tattoos and raceskills, to accurately and easily keep track.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>defup <ForestGreen>Turn on automatic defense upkeep of defenses.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>kd <defname> <ForestGreen>Toggle a specific defense upkeep on/off.") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> also has the built in capability to utilize the antiquated artifact goggles, making a number of defs instantaneous and without cost.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggle goggles <ForestGreen>Toggle Sunder using goggles or not.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>mygoggles # <ForestGreen>Tell Sunder what level your goggles are set to.") cecho("
") cecho("
")

Alias.name: Sunder calling helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>Calling <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>In previous iterations of Sunder, we used static calling lists that were susceptible to failure due to not having new people updated, people switching tethers, needing different orders, etc. To that end, we have updated our methodology and you may find all of the ways to manipulate targets below.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>tcl <ForestGreen>Turn on automatic target calling.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atl [name]<ForestGreen> Add targets in the priority you specify.") cecho("
 <white> Example > <red>atl ezreal nazeebo meepo") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atp [name] [position]<ForestGreen> Add target with/without a # value for priority.") cecho("
 <white> Example > <red>atp tryndamere 1") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>tlist<ForestGreen> List your targets in web for others.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atlc<ForestGreen> Clears your targets out to start over.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atr<ForestGreen> Remove a singular target from your list.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>nt<ForestGreen> Manually skip to the next target in line.") cecho("
")

Alias.name: ^sunder help directory$
Alias.script: cecho("\n<MediumSeaGreen>Found: <white>"..getMudletHomeDir())

Alias.name: setup
Alias.script: snd.send("config wrapwidth 0") snd.send("config auto_outc on") snd.send("config combatmessages on") snd.send("config affliction_view on") snd.send("config simple_diag on") snd.send("config curemsgs default") snd.send("config fishnumbers on") snd.send("gathering on") if not sndNDB.installed then sndNDB_Install() sndNDB.highlightNames = false end

Alias.name: toggles
Alias.script: cecho("<white>Toggles:") for tog in pairs(snd.toggles) do if snd.toggles[tog] then cecho("<green>\n"..string.title(tog)) else cecho("<red>\n"..string.title(tog)) end end send(" ")

Alias.name: lighting
Alias.script: snd.toggle("lighting")

Alias.name: on
Alias.script: snd.toggles.active = true cecho("<green>Sunder is ON!") send(" ")

Alias.name: off
Alias.script: snd.toggles.active = false cecho("<red>Sunder is OFF!") send(" ")

Alias.name: calling
Alias.script: snd.clearTargetList() snd.toggle("calling")

Alias.name: affcalling
Alias.script: snd.toggle("affcalling")

Alias.name: gallop
Alias.script: snd.toggle("gallop")

Alias.name: newb basher
Alias.script: snd.toggle("newbie")

Alias.name: parry
Alias.script: snd.toggle("parrying")

Alias.name: attack echoes
Alias.script: snd.toggle("atkecho")

Alias.name: listening
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "off" then if snd.toggles.listening then snd.toggle("listening") end else if not snd.toggles.listening then snd.toggle("listening") end snd.toggles.listening = true if snd.offense_loaded then snd.callers = {} for name in string.gmatch(matches[2], '([^ ]+)') do table.insert(snd.callers, string.title(name)) end cecho("<white>Listening to: <green>"..table.concat(snd.callers, "<white>, <green>").."<white>!") send(" ") else cecho("<white>Listening <green>ON<white>!") send(" ") end end

Alias.name: rockharvest
Alias.script: snd.toggle("rockharvest")

Alias.name: lightning
Alias.script: snd.toggle("lightning")

Alias.name: dash
Alias.script: snd.toggle("dash")

Alias.name: Chameleon
Alias.script: snd.toggle("chameleon")

Alias.name: Questing
Alias.script: snd.toggle("questing")

Alias.name: Ylem Goggles
Alias.script: snd.toggle("goggles") snd.goggle_update()

Alias.name: Goggle level
Alias.script: if matches[3] then cecho("<red>You have set your ylem goggles level to:<orange_red> "..matches[3].."<red>.") snd.toggles.goggle_level = tonumber(matches[3]) snd.goggle_update() else cecho("<red>You have set your ylem goggles level to:<orange_red> "..snd.toggles.goggle_level.."<red>.") end

Alias.name: Dome auto use
Alias.script: snd.toggle("dome")

Alias.name: Auto check plants
Alias.script: snd.toggle("plants")

Alias.name: Cobra bashing
Alias.script: snd.toggle("cobra")

Alias.name: Gag non target curing
Alias.script: snd.toggle("nontargetgags")

Alias.name: auto reject lust
Alias.script: snd.toggle("auto_reject")

Alias.name: Purge/Purify/Panacea
Alias.script: if snd.class == "Praenomen" or snd.class == "Akkari" then snd.toggle("purify") elseif snd.class == "Carnifex" or snd.class == "Warden" then snd.toggle("purge") elseif snd.class == "Shaman" or snd.class == "Alchemist" then snd.toggle("panacea") else cecho("\nYou have no purging ability for your class that needs to be turned on.") end

Alias.name: Prism Bashing
Alias.script: if snd.class == "Ascendril" or snd.class == "Bloodborn" then snd.toggle("prism") else cecho("\nYou cannot prism bash in this class.") end

Alias.name: Enrich Bashing
Alias.script: if snd.class == "Ascendril" or snd.class == "Bloodborn" then snd.toggle("enrich") else cecho("\nYou cannot enrich bash in this class.") end

Alias.name: Hidden afflictions diagnose count
Alias.script: if matches[2] then cecho("<red>You will diagnose at <yellow>"..matches[2].."<red> hidden afflictions.") snd.toggles.diagaffs = tonumber(matches[2]) else cecho("<red>You currently diagnose at<yellow> "..snd.toggles.diagaffs.."<red> hidden afflictions.") end

Alias.name: Chameleon Targets
Alias.script: local people = matches[2]:gsub(",", "") peopleTable = matches[2]:split(" ") snd.toggles.chameleonPeople = peopleTable snd.message("Will try to chameleon as one of: "..table.concat(snd.toggles.chameleonPeople, ", "))

Alias.name: target rune for tidesage/teradrim
Alias.script: snd.toggles.targetrune = not snd.toggles.targetrune if snd.toggles.targetrune then cecho("<red>Will now factor in targeting rune for tidesage/teradrim limb damage.") else cecho("<red>Will no longer factor in targeting rune for tidesage/teradrim limb damage.") end

Alias.name: ^toggle alerts$
Alias.script: snd.toggles.alerts = not snd.toggles.alerts if snd.toggles.alerts then cecho("<red>Will now display alerts on your prompt.") else cecho("<red>Will no longer display alerts on your prompt.") end

Alias.name: set 200 race
Alias.script:
local ascendantTypes = { "none", -- "adherent", split this up into the flavors below "seraph", "aetherial", "titan", "glacian", "nocturn", "sagani", "chaos", "tiarna", "astral",
"instinct", "malevolent", "strife", "corruption", "memory", "tyranny", } if table.contains(ascendantTypes, matches[2]:lower()) then snd.toggles.ascendedtype = matches[2]:lower() cecho("<red>Ascended race set to: "..matches[2]:lower()) else cecho("<red>Invalid ascended race. Options are: "..table.concat(ascendantTypes, ", ")) end

Alias.name: Set your mount
Alias.script: snd.toggles.mount = matches[2] cecho("<red>Your mount's ID has been set to: "..snd.toggles.mount)

Alias.name: mount
Alias.script: snd.send("qeb recall "..snd.toggles.mount..snd.sep.."recall mount"..snd.sep.."quickmount "..snd.toggles.mount)

Alias.name: dismount
Alias.script: snd.send("qeb qdmount"..snd.sep.."order "..snd.toggles.mount.." follow me")

Alias.name: shield tattoo
Alias.script:
if snd.toggles.attacking then snd.send("undefend") end
if snd.toggles.attacking == true then snd.toggle("attacking") end if snd.toggles.bashing == true then snd.toggle("bashing") end if snd.toggles.fasthunt == true then snd.toggle("fasthunt") end
if snd.have_aff("paresis") then snd.send("firstaid elevate paresis") end if snd.class == "Carnifex" then snd.send("qeb soul shield") else snd.send("qeb touch shield tattoo") end

Alias.name: wield none

Alias.name: directions
